item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Select this page as your blog page in the admin panel unter Theme Options -> Blog.

item.title: Portfolio
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Select this page as your a portfolio in the admin panel unter Theme Options -> Portfolio and pick "Test" as category. Then delete this text.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Included in the theme are 100+ Shortcodes to make your life a lot easier. Text Icons, Togglers, Tabs, a variety of Boxes, Columns, Tables, Lists, Dropcaps and Blockquotes are just a few available Shortcodes. You can even insert linked previews of your blog posts, pages and portfolio entries into your page with one single shortcode that lets you configure how to display them through a variety of parameters. But don’t worry – the Theme comes with a Shortcode Generater that enables you to just set the shortcode options with a few clicks. [heading type="h2" underlined="true"]Text Icons[/heading] The Theme comes with [highlight]300+ icons[/highlight]. Here you can see some examples of text icons and their display options. It's fun to dig through the various icon sets with the Shortcode Generator that even previews the icons for you, before you send the shortcode to the editor. Everything just works with a few clicks - a true time saver. Phasellus hendrerit.[/icon_text] [/one_fourth] [spacer size="big"] [heading type="h2" underlined="true"]Toggler[/heading] Togglers let you stack up your content under a heading and then hide it. The user decides what content should show up. This is perfect for FAQ pages. The Theme also comes with a Shortcode Generator, that enables you to generate even complex shortcodes with just a few clicks. [one_half]

[/one_fourth] [hr] [spacer size="big"] [heading type="h2" underlined="true"]Tables[/heading] [two_third] The table shortcode is mostly just used to style an HTML table. The table code itself is still HTML, because a table shortcode would require the exact same amount of code. [table]
Mollis 4 Million 2 Million 1 Million
Porttitor: Quisque Volutpat Interdum
Dapibus Quisque volutpat Morbi est est Donec consectetuer
Viverra Vulputate magna Ligula Ultrices
Cursus Quisque volutpat – Aliquam quam (Quisque volutpat) Morbi est est – Aliquam quam (Mollis volutpat) Donec consectetuer – Aliquam quam (Interdum)
Quam placerat Yes No No
[/table] [spacer size="small"] [table]
Table 2: Lorem ipsum dolor consectetuer
Porttitor Quisque Volutpat Interdum
4 Million 2 Million 1 Million 4 Million
Dapibus Quisque volutpat Morbi est est Donec consectetuer
Viverra Vulputate magna Ligula Ultrices
Quisque volutpat – Aliquam quam Morbi est est – Aliquam quam Donec consectetuer – Aliquam quam Quisque volutpat – Aliquam quam
Yes No No Yes
[/table] [/two_third] [spacer size="big"] [heading type="h2" underlined="true"]Lists[/heading] [one_third]

item.title: Front Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Select this page as your front page in the admin panel unter Theme Options -> Front Page. Then delete this line. [entries type="portfolio" count="3" column_size="one-third" excerpt_length="37"] [box with_bg="true"] [one_fourth] [icon_text icon="tools_paint-brush.png" icon_position="top" box="false"] [heading type='h3' no_top_padding='true']Styling & Color[/heading] Arcadia comes in over 15 different color schemes that you can pick from. This gives you the ability to give your site personality and you can match with the color that fits your business best. [/icon_text] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [icon_text icon="tools_tools.png" icon_position="top" box="false"] [heading type='h3' no_top_padding='true']Customizable[/heading] The admin panel gives you tons of options to customize your site till it fits your needs exactly. The possibilities are endless, but to make it usable for everyone it also works right out of the box. [/icon_text] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [icon_text icon="settings_cog-5.png" icon_position="top" box="false"] [heading type='h3' no_top_padding='true']Framework[/heading] Arcadia is based on rock solid HTML5/CSS3 frontend code. The modular WordPress framework was build with flexibility in mind and is state of the art to make your site as functional as it can be. [/icon_text] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth last] [icon_text icon="power_power.png" icon_position="top" box="false"] [heading type='h3' no_top_padding='true']Shortcodes[/heading] The theme makes use of shortcodes. A generator helps you customize and even preview the shortcode with just a few clicks. You don't have to memorize all you codes anymore. [/icon_text] [/one_fourth] [/box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Phasellus hendrerit. Pellentesque aliquet nibh nec urna.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
